description: Nora Polyansky debuts as a 25-year-old Anti-U.N. variable fighter pilot who single-handedly takes down a squadron of U.N. Spacy F-14`s, including one piloted by protagonist http://anidb.net/ch14110 [Kudou Shin], with the new Anti-U.N. SV-51 variable fighter. Highly skilled in both flying and close quarters combat, she is dedicated to the defeat of the U.N. forces who have killed her family and inflicted a huge scar, both physical and mental, upon her. She is attached to the SV-51 squadron led by http://anidb.net/ch14113 [D.D. Ivanov] and acts as his wingmate, right hand pilot and lover. Ruthless in her mission, she represents http://anidb.net/ch14110 [Shin]`s chief rival in the sky and on the ground.She is killed in the final episode of the series by an energy blast from the Protoculture biomecha known as the http://anidb.net/ch50522 [Tori no Hito] while attempting to shoot down http://anidb.net/ch14110 [Shin]`s VF-0.Source: wiki
name: Nora Polyansky
